name: The Riese Project - Prologue
description:
The Riese Project - Prologue is a playable introduction to the full version of the game. It will immerse you in the mysterious underground of the Owl Mountains. The plot is based on one of the most enigmatic complexes built by the Nazis between 1943-1945 - the "Riese Complex". As Anna, you will follow in the footsteps of your grandfather's discoveries, unraveling the secrets from World War II. Engage in a battle for the truth and risk losing your return to reality. Experience a fascinating world that completely engrosses the player.

Captivating plot and intriguing puzzles:

In the Prologue, you will find yourself in the midst of an ambitious story, based on true events. Full of mysteries and puzzles that require cleverness and observance.


Unique hint system:

We have designed a phone with a full operating system in the game. Players can 'dig through' various messages, notes, photos, voice recordings, etc. to find the necessary clues.






Thanks to the camera function, players can take photos of different places and objects that may prove to be significant later. You can also change the time in real-time using the phone.



Additionally, in the phone, you'll find a mini-game that will provide you with some fun and relaxation.

Real locations and places in reality:

Thanks to the application of Photoscanning technology, the locations in the game are replicas of real-world places.

The player's base is the real building "Szyprówka Chata pod Sową" in the Owl Mountains.

Innovative technologies:

The game is being developed in the Unreal Engine 5 with the use of Lumen and Nanite technologies, guaranteeing the highest quality VR graphics.


Gameplay duration:

The narrative offers several hours of gameplay. An engaging story packed with numerous interactive objects and places where you can play and lose track of time.


Dynamic changing conditions:

The game offers variable weather and the ability to manipulate the time of day, introducing additional dynamism and diversifying the gameplay.

Arcade games:

This is an interesting way to relax between uncovering the next mysteries!


Potato Mode:

A special graphics preset makes it possible to play even on several-years-old computers.




If you like the concept, make sure to check out our prologue, which was worked on by experts from various fields, including 3D world specialists!

Our team has worked on productions such as: Iron Man, Call of Duty: Warzone, Company Of Heroes 3, Medieval Dynasty, and others.
